page.title: 18T.V. Programmes, Pitreavie
page.content: Since the invention of television 30 years ago there has been a wide range of programmes, such as Bill and Ben which are two puppets and Lassie which is about a collie dog, also Coronation Street which is about ordinary people's everyday life. Over the last 10 years there have been many new programmes for children such as Bagpuss,Blue Peter and The Biskitts, watched by millions of viewers over Britain for entertainment and education. From sixp.m. adults' programmes start+ game shows like Family Fortunes, The Price is Right and Bullseye give adults the chance to win lots of money and prizes, like cars, holidays and many other things. American soap operas(serials about rich Americans) special news programmes about world affairs. David Finlayson.
